notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 56R. Bottom right specimen.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: THIS BILL shall pass current forTWO SHILLINGS and SIX PENCE, within the Province of Pennsylvania, according to an Act of Assembly, made in the Fourth Year of the Reign of King GEORGE III. Dated the 18th Day of June, 1764. Half-a-Crown
issue_reverse_legend_s: To Counterfeit is DEATH.| Printed by B. FRANKLIN, AND D. HALL. 1764
